tc_game_scripts.script_contents: @echo off For /f "tokens=2-4 delims=/ " %%a in ('date /t') do (set mydate=%%a-%%b-%%c) For /f "tokens=1-2 delims=/:" %%a in ('time /t') do (set mytime=%%a-%%b) mkdir "backups\configs\%mydate%_%mytime%" copy /Y "7dtdsaves\serveradmincustom.xml" ".\backups\configs\%mydate%_%mytime%" copy /Y "serverconfigmain.xml" ".\backups\configs\%mydate%_%mytime%" copy /Y "Data\Config\*.xml*" ".\backups\configs\%mydate%_%mytime%"
